name: Kide Santoku
description: Great Santoku knife for cutting root vegetables, slicing meat, chopping vegetables.

The Kide series consists of sharp, easy-care kitchen knives and a roast fork. The German stainless steel and forged construction make them durable and they remain sharp in use. The SantopreneÂ® handle is easy to keep clean and offers a good grip.
Ergonomic handle is comfortable to use. We recommend hand wash and sharpening with Marttiini sharpeners.
